dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Cracked software (warez) on one of your servers]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 2004 3:41 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Cracked software (warez) on one of your servers]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Cracked software (warez) on one of your servers
Date: Wed, 08 Dec 2004 10:53:04 -0500
From: Gary Oberbrunner <garyo@genarts.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com

Hi, my name is Gary Oberbrunner, I'm with GenArts, Inc.

We found a cracked version of several of our software packages on one of
your
servers at ftp://trader@67.18.159.170/Public_Trader/.
This user on your server is hosting illegal software and is violating your
acceptable use policy.  Please remove the offending files and directories
(specifically the ones with "Sapphire" in the name; those are illegal
copies
of our software).

Feel free to contact me if you have any questions.

Thanks,

- --
. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
Gary Oberbrunner                garyo@genarts.com
GenArts, Inc.                   Tel: 617-492-2888
8 Clinton Street                Fax: 617-492-2852
Cambridge, MA 02139 USA         http://web.genarts.com
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFBv13cvK/XpJs6oyURAqmYAJ4zMrGKqN/bVw85pjthF8CrulIRjACfa4qL
PRg4JwAZc5awVrMVYFkIwvk=
=ecPn
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
